title: Bott-Chern characteristic classes of blow-ups
authors: Xiaojun Wu, Song Yang, Xiangdong Yang
abstract:
We prove a blow-up formula for Bott-Chern characteristic classes of compact
complex manifolds. To this end, we establish a version of Riemann-Roch without
denominators for the Bott-Chern characteristic classes. In particular, as an
application, we study the behaviour of the Bott-Chern characteristic classes of
the Iwasawa manifold under a blow-up transformation.
